Articles.Content:
I noticed a few days ago that the texture for this piece wasn't finished. It was also kinda ugly, not to be mean or anything.

When I imported it to 3ds max I aslo found out its UV map was a mess. So, I fixed up.

I used the decoupler texture and modified in in Photoshop, saving me from creating an entirely new texture from scrap.

Here's the bottom, in-game.

What do you think?
upload it, what are you waiting for, looks great

Here's the file.

Download the attachment, or use this: http://www./?n3ul37dq41hfuqq
Shiny! I always wondered why the tricoupler texture looked off compared to the others.

Shiny! I always wondered why the tricoupler texture looked off compared to the others.

Because it's the only part that went unnoticed when we were remodelling all of them. It's a placeholder asset I made in half an hour to test the multiple attachments, and it stayed.

When we went over the parts again, creating better assets, we completely overlooked the tricoupler :-X

Cheers

EDIT: As requested, this new texture is now added to the 0.8.5 release (credits properly given)

Nice work.

I love how the community can help out like this.

Keep up the good work.
I'm glad this is in the game, it looks very nice.
